channel.title: RSC Bot
channel.description:
So guys, I know I havn't been around in forever but is there any development going on here with the RSC Bot? I was interested to see what you guys thought/know about the rsc client. From just basic playing, it looks like they use the runescape client to load the rsc game? Although I'm not sure about it or what they are up to... I'm just posting here to gather some information and see where you guys are at? I'm thinking about possibly starting a bot for rsc if I feel like it and have some free time so we'll see.
I also heard that there is a RSCBot that is made by T X? lol, do you guys know anything about that? Last I checked many of you hated him. Anyways, just let me know whats going on in this department :).

item.title: RSC Bot
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“henry, post:10, topic:345390”][quote author=Ollie link=topic=441769.msg3245548#msg3245548 date=1277325542]
I think they have some info on RSC over at RS-Hacking.com, make a post over there as they all love client hacking ^^
[/quote]
Alright, but I kind of thought you guys here all loved client hacking? At least… you used too lol.[/quote]

We do, I just don’t know of anyone currently interested in RSC client hacking at the moment.

Read full topic

item.title: RSC Bot
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

[quote=“henry, post:7, topic:345390”][quote author=xEnt link=topic=441769.msg3244995#msg3244995 date=1277277902]

rsc is dead, get over it

die

henry long time eh, but yeah i consider certain RSC pservers better than the original these days. RSC official servers have very few online worth making a bot for.
[/quote]
Yea it has been lol, ok, well maybe I’ll check some of them out then, but last time I was around I had kind of gotten bored with the private server side of things and wanted to check out botting again lol ;).

RLN is selling auths to his bot called A-POS on wartnet, afaik rscbot was clean until b61

I’m really, really not interested in paying money to see how someone else made their bot, especially since even after I pay for it, its not like I get to just look at the code… lol.[/quote]ur paying for a service not the code

Read full topic

item.title: RSC Bot
item.dc:creator: @henry henry
item.description:
@henry wrote:

Ok… lol, but what about the topic?

I’m not just asking about T X, I’m asking about runescape classic bots in general, and if anybody here on mitb is working on them/has information on how they work nowadays before I get started on them?

Read full topic

item.title: RSC Bot
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

The only reason anyone I know hates this ‘tx’ guy is because he is a script kiddie. Everything I have ever seen him release has some type of malware in it (usually for a botnet, which he then uses to attack sites).

So I’d stay away from everything he releases, whether it’s what you want or not.

Read full topic
